heading: HB03686
0: AN ACT TO BE KNOWN AS 'THE PHILIPPINE GENETICALLY MODIFIED ORGANISM (GMO) LABELING ACT, THE RIGHT-TO-KNOW-ACT' REQUIRING THE MANDATORY LABELING AND REGULATION OF FOOD WHICH ARE GMOs OR CONTAINING SUBSTANCES DERIVED FROM GMOs AND THOSE PRODUCED BY GENETIC ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGIES, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-12-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03686
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO BE KNOWN AS 'THE PHILIPPINE GENETICALLY MODIFIED ORGANISM (GMO) LABELING ACT, THE RIGHT-TO-KNOW-ACT' REQUIRING THE MANDATORY LABELING AND REGULATION OF FOOD WHICH ARE GMOs OR CONTAINING SUBSTANCES DERIVED FROM GMOs AND THOSE PRODUCED BY GENETIC ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGIES, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA
DATE FILED : 2016-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bravo (M.) (069 2017-02-13)2. Suansing (E.) (073 2017-02-21)
3. Tambunting (000 2018-09-03)4. Olivarez (000 2018-09-04)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-07-31
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-28
          -Initial deliberation on HBs 3686, 3810 and 5311.
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-12-12
          -Resumption of deliberation on HBs 3686, 3810 and 5311 on the proposed GMO Labeling and Regulation Act, in Executive Session.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2018-08-02
